summary: A remix/tribute I made for the game we all know and love in my own unique musical style.
descriptionHtml:
Oh wow look it's another music producer shamelessly plugging his shitty music. O_O
Usually I'm making music to appease to rave culture and festivals I play but since I'm such a big fan of this franchise I thought it'd be fun to remix it for myself. Wasn't going to post it here but I had a few friends suggest otherwise, I hope you guys smell what I'm stepping in!

I, as well as a few of my friends use this as a replacer for the main menu music, who knows- might tickle your fancy dangle.

If you do dig it, you can find more of my weird shit here:
https://soundcloud.com/numbraoffical/

And alternatively if you don't want to download it you can just go preview it using this link here:
https://soundcloud.com/numbraoffical/dragonburn-curmz
author: NUMBRA
